statements: SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic, financial_interest FROM conflicts_of_interest;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE financial_interest > 10000;
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT research_topic, financial_interest FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY financial_interest DESC;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE financial_interest > 1000 ORDER BY researcher_name ASC
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE research_topic = 'Medicine' ORDER BY researcher_name DESC
SELECT research_topic, COUNT(*) AS total_conflicts FROM conflicts_of_interest GROUP BY research_topic HAVING total_conflicts > 1
SELECT researcher_name, SUM(financial_interest) AS total_financial_interest FROM conflicts_of_interest GROUP BY researcher_name ORDER BY total_financial_interest DESC
SELECT DISTINCT affiliation FROM conflicts_of_interest
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest_disclosures;
SELECT reporter_name, disclosure_date FROM conflicts_of_interest_disclosures WHERE pharmaceutical_company = 'Pfizer';
SELECT disclosure_id, conflict_description FROM conflicts_of_interest_disclosures ORDER BY disclosure_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest_disclosures WHERE reporter_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT DISTINCT pharmaceutical_company FROM conflicts_of_interest_disclosures;

SELECT disclosure_id, disclosure_date, conflict_description, pharmaceutical_company, reporter_name FROM conflicts_of_interest_disclosures WHERE disclosure_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY disclosure_date DESC
SELECT disclosure_id, conflict_description, pharmaceutical_company FROM conflicts_of_interest_disclosures WHERE pharmaceutical_company LIKE '%pharma%' ORDER BY disclosure_id
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest_disclosures WHERE reporter_name='John Doe' OR reporter_name='Jane Smith' ORDER BY reporter_name
SELECT disclosure_id, reporter_name, conflict_description FROM conflicts_of_interest_disclosures WHERE conflict_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY disclosure_id
SELECT reporter_name, pharmaceutical_company, disclosure_date FROM conflicts_of_interest_disclosures WHERE disclosure_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY disclosure_date ASC
SELECT * FROM disclosures WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT author, disclosed_company FROM disclosures ORDER BY disclosure_date DESC;
SELECT author, details FROM disclosures WHERE disclosed_company = 'Company XYZ';
SELECT author, disclosed_company, disclosure_date FROM disclosures WHERE disclosure_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT author, disclosed_company, disclosure_date FROM disclosures WHERE disclosed_company = 'Company ABC' AND author LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT * FROM disclosures ORDER BY disclosure_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT author, disclosed_company, COUNT(*) AS disclosure_count FROM disclosures GROUP BY author, disclosed_company ORDER BY disclosure_count DESC;

SELECT d.id, d.disclosure_date, d.details, a.name AS author_name, c.name AS company_name FROM disclosures d JOIN authors a ON d.author = a.id JOIN companies c ON d.disclosed_company = c.id WHERE d.disclosure_date >= '2022-01-01' AND d.disclosure_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY d.disclosure_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT a.name AS author_name, a.email, a.affiliation, c.name AS company_name, c.industry FROM authors a JOIN disclosures d ON a.id = d.author JOIN companies c ON d.disclosed_company = c.id WHERE c.country = 'USA' ORDER BY a.name, c.name;
SELECT author, disclosed_company, COUNT(*) AS disclosure_count FROM disclosures GROUP BY author, disclosed_company HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY disclosure_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest;
SELECT physician_name, conflict_description FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE disclosure_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT physician_name, company_name FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY physician_name ASC;
SELECT company_name, headquarters_location FROM companies WHERE industry_sector = 'Technology';
SELECT first_name, last_name, specialty FROM physicians WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest;
SELECT physician_name, conflict_description FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE disclosure_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, physician_name, disclosure_date FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY disclosure_date DESC;
SELECT phys.first_name, phys.last_name, comp.company_name FROM physicians AS phys JOIN companies AS comp ON phys.id = comp.id;
SELECT DISTINCT comp.company_name, comp.industry_sector, doc.specialty FROM companies AS comp JOIN physicians AS doc ON comp.id = doc.id;
SELECT * FROM authors
SELECT full_name, email FROM authors ORDER BY full_name DESC
SELECT organization, industry_sector FROM organizations WHERE industry_sector = 'Finance'
SELECT author, disclosure_text FROM conflicts_of_interest LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2
SELECT * FROM disclosures WHERE disclosure_type = 'Conflict'
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT author, disclosure_text FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE date_disclosed > '2022-01-01';
SELECT author_id, full_name, email, organization FROM authors JOIN organizations ON authors.organization = organizations.org_name;
SELECT disclosure_id, disclosure_date, disclosure_type FROM disclosures WHERE disclosure_type IN ('Financial', 'Legal') ORDER BY disclosure_date DESC;
SELECT org_id, org_name, industry_sector FROM organizations WHERE industry_sector = 'Technology' LIMIT 10;
